name: The Giant, The Sword, The Town, & The Traveler
name_original: The Giant, The Sword, The Town, & The Traveler
description:
Movement-WASD
E- Action
Space- Slash Sword (When Equipped)

The Giant that he is looking for is where the Traveler finds himself after taking a break from traveling. Now his travels truly begin now, because he has to find out what he is truly in search of... With help from people in the village!

Made for The BEBADBOI November Jam
